nodes.text: This mystical stone was an object with inexplicable powers that was given to an adventurer by the Tulgah Echrhin Isdan in 1.5 ABY. It was a white, smooth stone that could glow eerily.

When this adventurer visited the village of the Myyydril tribe in the Myyydril Caverns, he met the Tulgah Echrhin Isdan. Isdan asked the adventurer to collect smooth stones from the river and pond outside the cave. As a reward for bringing him the stones, Isdan gave the adventurer this smooth stone and told him that it provided a quick way to get out of the caverns.
The adventurer discovered that the stone had the power to instantly teleport him from anywhere in the Myyydril Caverns back to the Wookiee city of Kachirho.

The Mystical Stone was a reward for a small quest in Rage of the Wookiees, the second addon for Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. It could be used to teleport the player from anywhere within the Myyydril Caverns back to Kachirho. This spared players the long way back through the caverns and the surrounding Kkowir Forest area where vehicles could not be used.
